PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13602022-12-15CH,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MATTHEW BLAIR of Mahone Bay, Nova Scotia, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Paul R. Baay, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MATTHEW BLAIR of Mahone Bay, Nova Scotia, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Paul R. Baay, whose term has expired.
